Source Products

Sourcing In China Starts From Here

Transportation & Parts

After decades of cooperation with international companies, Chinese auto manufacturers start to access to international market with high quality and low price products, and the export volume has increased year by year.

The categories we offer include :

Auto 、Scooter、Truck、Motocycle、Vehicle tools、bike、parts & Accessories

Construction & decoration

Chinese building materials vary a lot in different periods of the world history and in different areas,as the international trade cooperation deepens,high quality and low-cost become new traits of Chinese building materials.

The categories we offer include :

Bathroom & Kitchen、Sand & Stone、Tiles & Flooring、Door & Window、Finishing Building Materials、Structural Building Materials、Furniture

Machinary,Industrial Equipment&tools

Machinery plays as backbone industry in China modern development process. It is closely tied with large - scale production and hi-technology. Especially for current decades, Chinese machinery industry has become a new name-card of Chinese innovation. More great machinery manufactures are blooming in the market and gaining market share worldwide.

The categories we offer include :

Machinery & accessories、Hydraulic & Pneumatic、General Mechanical Components、Power & Transmission、Welding & Solder、tools、hardware.

General merchandise

The General Merchandise in China has formed a comprehensive competitive advantage and development strongly in the worldwide for many years, which has exported to more than 200 countries and regions worldwide, accounting for nearly 40% in international market.

The categories we offer include :

gift & toys、sports goods、Office stationery、kitchenware & Bedding、lights、washroom staff & others、cloth, shoes & accessories.

Consumer electronics

Due to the large amount of mobile users, the market share of 3C products have been growing bigger and faster. 80% of mobile phone accessories in global market are from China. The reasons that Chinese 3C products are taking the most shares of the market are not only for the huge quantity, but also for the super quality. So that we can look forward to a promising future.

The categories we offer include :

Audio & Video Devices、Digital Devices、Household Electrical Appliances、Commerce & Office Electronics、cables、Video Game & Accessories、parts & Accessories.

Food,Beverage & Agriculture

China is an agricultural country with more than 1.3 billion population. As reported by Chinese Ministry of Commerce in 2016, the export volume of Chinese agricultural products is 72.61 billion US dollars, with year-on-year growth 3.5%. Asia, Europe and North America take top 3 markets in the world. In the list of export products, the top 3 are seafood, vegetables, fruit and nut.

The categories we offer include :

Farm mahinery & equipment、Garden Tools、Agochemicals、Fruit & Vegetables Plant& Animal Oil、Grain Products、Nuts & Kernels.

Electrical & Telecoms

The electrical and electronic industry in China has enjoyed a rapid development with the invention of innovative technologies in the past 20 years, which is becoming the most flourishing and extremely diversified sector consisting of manufacturers, suppliers, dealers, retailers, electrical engineers, electricians, electronic equipment manufacturers, and trade unions.

The categories we offer include :

Electronic Components、Electrical Equipment、Electrical mechanical、Telecommunication Equipment、security and protection 、Industrial control system、parts & Accessories.

Steel,Chemical & energy

With the rapid modernization of economy, construction, infrastructure and manufacturing, these heavy industries in China have developed over several decades and have become the pillar of export trade of China.

The categories we offer include :

flat steel materials、long steel materials、wires、Non-Metallic Materials、Mining & Metallurgy Machinery、Energy、Chemicals.
